sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>temple</radical> isn't a monk like you'd expect. It's a <kanji>samurai</kanji>, who protects the monks in return for prayers that keep him safe.
meaningInfo: You walk up to a temple and you're surprised to find that there's a samurai guarding it. Talk to him for a while so he can tell you why he has been doing this job. He's quite a nice guy, actually.
readingMnemonic: The reading is <reading>samurai</reading>, which should be easy enough to remember.
readingInfo: If you know the meaning you know the reading as well! That doesn't happen too often with kanji, so consider yourself lucky!
